Borrow. Wear. Return.

Your dream outfit is already in your friend’s closet. Find it, request it, and borrow with ease.

How It Works

Upload Your Clothes

Snap a pic or link your wardrobe to Frvr.

Find Your Friends

Connect and browse their closets in one place.

Request & Confirm

Send a quick request and get a reply instantly.

AI-Powered Payments

[Coming Soon] Fair reimbursements, no hassle.

Accomplishments We’re Proud Of

Frvr isn’t just a payment or rental app—it’s a community-driven, eco-friendly solution. We combat fast fashion waste by enabling continuous reuse of clothes and promoting sustainability.

Gift Feature

Borrow for free with our “gift” feature—lend clothes without any charge, and enjoy free borrowing next time. It’s all about favors and trust among friends.
